author: Josh Gerstein
title: Federal prisons mark first virus death
description: An inmate in Louisiana succumbs nine days after transfer to a hospital.
content:
A federal correctional institution. | David Zalubowski, File/AP Photo
By JOSH GERSTEIN
03/29/2020 08:43 AM EDT
The U.S. federal prison system has recorded its first death attributed to the coronavirus pandemic as criminal justice reform advocates and publi… [+738 chars]
